name: Heaven Rush
description:
Heaven Rush is a single-player FPS game where you play as Gadreel.

Game Story

Awoken from a trance by an unknown entity (a demon), you now have to escape the angelic city of Saint Derek or forever be imprisoned. The mysterious entity (the demon) also gives Gadreel the power to absorb Heaven's power. Using these newfound abilities, Gadeel parkours through the streets and vanquishes any angels who dare step on his path to freedom.

Features:

- Wallrun and Parkour through the city of Saint Derek

- Slay waves of angels in great fashion

- Fight against three different enemies AI

- Stop Time (The World!)

Development Team:

Yu Ju (Jim) Chen: Programmer

Jackson Blanchard: Artist

 Adrian Wu: Artist

Gabriel Felipe Ayala Arenas: Level Designer 

Tran Hai Dang (Dang) Nguyen: Project Manager 

Sawyer King: Sound Designer 

Brennan Farand: Concept Artist 

Julia Poland: Concept Artist 

Lowen Theodore Segundo: Concept Artist
